name: Black Friday Survival
description:
Fight off wave after wave of enemies in this price-cutting new game. Armed with only watery weaponry, you must deter the many Karens from entering your store on this busy day.

Move with up and down (w/s or arrow keys or left  joystick on controller)

Shoot with Fire1(left mouseclick, leftcontrol, or on a ps4 controller - right trigger, left bumper or the square button)

Buy upgrades by clicking the buttons or using the hotkeys(3 for repair, 4 for magazine upgrade, 5 for damage upgrade, and 6 to unlock a new weapon (swap weapons with 1 and 2))

Pause with escape or by pressing the pause button in the corner

Can you survive the many Karen's, Sharon's, Becky's, Deborah's and Susan's?

Only one way to find out!
